chat_history.message:
Hello, I bought a 'excellent' phone but it arrived with signs of wear... What should I do? Thanks in advance! Thanks for your help,

The customer confirms that the article has not been disassembled by an unprofessional refurbisher and has not been damaged by falls or exposure to water.

Hello Anna, You will find your return label attached. The return process will be handled by DHL Express: choose the most convenient pickup location to send back your package. The list of pickup locations is available at this link: https://locator.dhl.com/?l=en&countryCode=IT Preparing for a return: 1. Read instructions on how to return a product here 2. Don't forget to include all accessories you received with the product 3. Remove any protective covers or films 4. Place the product and accessories in a box following the guidelines below. Packaging the product: • The box must be sturdy and resistant, and the product should be positioned inside so it doesn't move during transportation. • Apply the return label to the top of the box (you can also include an extra label for identification purposes). • Take a photo of the inside and outside of the package before sending it. This way you'll be protected in case the product is damaged during transport. Your product is ready to ship! We will let you know as soon as it arrives. Best regards, The Back Market Customer Service, The Back Market Customer Service

Dear ecomobile 

I would like to inform you that the customer will return his phone for refund.
Thanks in advance for your help.

Regards,
Mirana from the Back Care Team
